sentence: Whats black, white, and red all over? a newspaper.
explanation: The term refers to the color of something that has been printed with ink.

sentence: What do you call a belt made out of watches? a waist of time.

sentence: What did the bee say to the naughty bee? bee-hive yourself !

sentence: Why did the military take over turkey? to prove they were not chicken.
